entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
